description.value: This bulky set of goggles functions as a lighted magnifying glass or microscope, allowing you to see exceptionally small details with adjustable levels of magnification. Microgoggles provide a +2 insight bonus to any skill use that benefits from exceedingly close vision, such as detecting complicated forgeries or crafting @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JaRMioj4isNp7r1P.JournalEntryPage.ZaS9H4rwaFIQTUBC]{Drugs} or medicinals.
